meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leslie Page Leo Velazquez Matt Samberg Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6412.

td.p: Leslie Page, a public library director from Woonsocket, Rhode Island
Leo Velazquez, a theme park ride operator from Orange, California
Matt Samberg, an attorney from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $44,601)

tr.td: WORDS WITH FRIENDS
FACE THE NATION
LETTER-HEADS
(Alex: Each correct response will be a letter followed by a word.)
DOUBLE DOUBLE E
CLASSIC ALBUMS
ON THE TURNTABLE
